bioQuestions.question: What else?
bioQuestions.answer: Zach Burpee is an up-and-coming ace up Tuft‚Äôs sleeve; key words: up-and-coming. With the agility and stamina of a baby deer, this lanky fcg will jog everywhere on his wobbly stilt legs. He likes to jog under or hover in open space ready to receive a disc on the sideline for few, if any, yards. He will then take his time on every fake and throw to ensure he looks casual doing it. Whether this means throwing a dish with a totally cocked wrist and almost missing his receiver because he wanted to flip the disc with the nonchalance of a unionized Frenchman or tossing a blade-scoober to the far handler in zone with the confidence of an affluent heterosexual white male in America. While he has some skill, he will overestimate his own abilities throwing downfield, or he will mindlessly dump for a loss like someone for whom yards have never been in short supply. When Zach goes deep it is often halfhearted though well timed. He will go deep from a standstill if there is nobody above him as well as after an easily guarded under cut. This is somebody we can bully, and someone we should not fear so long as we are confident in our defensive sets and help each other out.

bioQuestions.question: What's the craziest thing you've done in the name of love?
bioQuestions.answer: Vibe all night, walk her home from the bar, sit on her porch talking, she says ‚ÄúMorgann....you're loitering‚Äù, still don't make a move on her, go home frustrated but happy, shower and get in bed, get a text that she thinks you're a coward, walk back to her house, tell her ‚Äúcome back out.‚Äù, kiss her, skip home giddy like a child. God why must good things end somebody please love me.

bioQuestions.question: What did Henry and Jacques talk about when they were alone in the FloWo hotel pool for ten minutes?
bioQuestions.answer: Both sitting on the same side of the pool, both looking straight ahead. Both shivering. They discuss Jacques' mlb the show my player season. They discuss whether henry knows jacques took the over on derrick white points+assists, and does hank know jacques thinks it'll cash. They have a great conversation where jacques looks at the yahoo sports app to see the nats box score and says ‚Äúay lets go big fella‚Äù. And most of all they relish the luxury of being able to sit in the silence of a beautiful male friendship

bioQuestions.question: A recent movie you saw + review
bioQuestions.answer: North by Northwest (Hitchcock Movie). I picked this movie out of the 326 offerings on the plane, and I wish I had picked something else. I had watched this move before when I was around 8 years old and I remember I loved it, but looking back that is probably only because I thought that escaping from criminals by climbing down Mt. Rushmore was the coolest thing in the world. The movie overall was solid (as all Hitchcock's are), but the ending of this one was especially outrageous and incomprehensible. 7/10
